main: Starts out the battle with 0 {status:HanafudaCombo} Potency and 3 Count as well as a random 'Suit in Hand' buff ({status:HanafudaOne}, {status:HanafudaTwo}, {status:HanafudaThree}).

Think of the Potency as the number of points she has and the Count as a timer for her to reach 5 points. Every turn, the Count goes down by 1, and if it's 0 when she uses a skill, her passive mechanic triggers at the end of the skill. When this happens, if she has less than 3 points, she just gets 2 {status:Enhancement} then {status:HanafudaCombo} resets to 0/3. If she has 3+ points, she uses her S3-2 as an unopposed attack.

Her S3-2 consumes all her {status:HanafudaCombo} to deal more damage and gain an extra Coin per stack/point she had. If she had 5, she also triggers {status:VibrationExplosion} twice on the last coin. After that, next turn her Hand randomizes its color and she resets to 0/3. If she didn't use up all her coins, she starts her next 'round' with points equal to the number of coins she didn't use instead of 0.

Each of the following will give her one point (only counts for her leftmost skill slot):
- Use a skill with an affinity that matches her current suit ({keyword:Wrath} for {status:HanafudaOne}, {keyword:Sloth} for {status:HanafudaTwo}, {keyword:Gloom} for {status:HanafudaThree}). This counts both her base skills and E.G.Os
- Use her S3 or an E.G.O skill
- Match her current suit 2 turns in a row
Meeting multiple conditions at the same time will give her a point for each condition, and you can tell how many points she got in a turn with the card visual and sound effect that happens when she uses her skill.

In addition to generating points, her leftmost skill will also convert her Hand to the suit matching that skill's affinity next turn, and if she matched her current suit, she triggers a {status:VibrationExplosion} and has a 25% chance to generate an extra E.G.O resource for the skill she used.
If there's no way for her to match her suit or generate points, she can use her defense skill to {status:Discard} skills, randomize her suit, and have a 50% chance to generate a point.
other: All her skills {status:Discard} skills that are different from the skill she used to help her match her suit easier on succeeding turns.
S3 triggers {status:VibrationCollapse} if her target isn't already in {status:Switch_Vibration}.
S2 has a 5 SP heal on hit.
Her passive gives her an additional 5 SP heal on tails hit and a 10% damage bonus against enemies in low morale or panic states.

1081301.desc:
On Tails Hit, heal 5 SP (once per turn)
Deal +10% damage against targets in either Low Morale or Panic states
1081301.name: Stacking the Deck

1081302.desc:
Turn Start: if this unit does not have [HanafudaCombo], gain 0 [HanafudaCombo] Potency and 3 [HanafudaCombo] Count

Turn Start: if this unit does not have a Suit in Hand, gain a random Suit([HanafudaOne], [HanafudaTwo], or [HanafudaThree]) that corresponds to a Base Attack Skill on this unit's leftmost Skill Slot

Combat Start: when this unit uses a Base Attack Skill or an E.G.O Skill equipped on its leftmost Skill Slot, activate the following (once per turn):
- Next turn, convert the Hand on self to the one corresponding to the used Skill's Affinity
- If the Skill was either "Sakura-sen" or an E.G.O Skill, gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
- If the Skill's Affinity matches the Affinity on the current Hand's description(thus "forming a Hand"), activate the following:
  · Gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
  · If this unit formed a Hand last turn and this turn in succession, gain 1 [HanafudaCombo] Potency
  · On Hit with the said Skill: trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
  · 25% chance to gain 1 E.G.O Resource corresponding to the Skill's Affinity
- At the Skill's Skill End: at 5 [HanafudaCombo] Potency, or at 0 [HanafudaCombo] Count, use "Kōzan"
1081302.name: Koi-Koi [こいこい]

1081321.desc: Combat Start: when 1 ally with the least SP uses a Base Attack Skill to Heads Hit, it heals 5 SP (2 times per turn; excluding allies at -40 or lower SP)
1081321.name: Relay

descs: Reuse this Coin ([HanafudaCombo] Potency - 1) times (4 times max)

data.desc:
[CantDuel]
This Skill does not trigger Defense Skills, and external effects cannot trigger this Skill to be Reused

[WhenUse] At less than 3 [HanafudaCombo] Potency, cancel the Skill and gain 2 [Enhancement] next turn
[WhenUse] At 3+ [HanafudaCombo] Potency, gain the following effects based on Potency:
- Per 1 Potency: this Skill deals +10% damage
- At 4+ Potency: Base Power +1
- At 5 Potency: On Hit with the final Reuse Coin, trigger [VibrationExplosion] 2 times; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[EndSkillAll] Lose [HanafudaCombo] on self
[EndSkillAll] Next turn, convert the Suit in this unit's Hand to a random Suit that corresponds to one of this unit's Base Attack Skills (once per turn)
[EndSkillAll] Gain [HanafudaCombo] Potency next turn equal to the # of Coins that weren't used
data.name: Kōzan [光斬]
